name: Format\ContentInset
description: The object for defining the space around the component content on one or more sides.DeprecatedUse the padding property in ComponentLayout instead.

properties.name: bottom
properties.description: A Boolean value that applies an inset to the bottom of the component.

properties.name: left
properties.description: A Boolean value that applies an inset to the left side of the component.

properties.name: right
properties.description: A Boolean value that applies an inset to the right side of the component.

properties.name: top
properties.description: A Boolean value that applies an inset to the top of the component.
